page.title: 13WORK IN WINCANTON
page.content:
"My Mum cleans the{Council Offices and works at the{bar}at Cow & Gate (Unigate) social club. My Dad is the {electrician}for Cow & Gate. He is in charge and is always on call. He is Chairman of the Social club and he empties the "bandits" (gambling machines) every few days. The money is banked and used to help run the club."
"Dad is a self-employed{electrician. He works around Wincanton. He takes business calls at home and does all his office work there. Mum answers the 'phone.He's been teaching Mum to drive for the last year but he's thinking of taking up fishing.Mum enjoys gardening and watching "Coronation Street" and "East Enders"."(soap opera serials)
"My Dad works in{Yeovil}as a{shoe {repairer.}He enjoys gardening."
